thread.title: New Volkswagen CEO to steer overhaul

title: New Volkswagen CEO to steer overhaul
text:
New Volkswagen CEO to steer overhaul 2:12pm BST - 01:37 
Volkswagen has chosen Herbert Diess as its new chief executive in an overhaul that includes streamlining the company's multiple car brands into just three groups while preparing its truck business for a potential listing. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Volkswagen has chosen Herbert Diess as its new chief executive in an overhaul that includes streamlining the company's multiple car brands into just three groups while preparing its truck business for a potential listing.
